title: Starship, a Robot Food-Delivery Startup, Nets $100 Million
sub_head: The company, whose robots resemble rolling beer coolers, this year has raised $57 million from the European Investment Bank and another $42 million from venture investors
body:
Starship Technologies Inc., a startup that runs fleets of self-driving delivery robots, said it raised roughly $100 million over the last two months as it rolls out in new cities and more college campuses.
The expansion comes as numerous on-demand delivery companies—both robotic and human—are struggling to figure out how to turn a profit.
Like...
